title: Early train services ending on NEL due to maintenance works

updates.text: Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE12 Serangoon & NE17 Punggol will end earlier at abt 11pm on Fri & Sat - Jan 4 &5 and 11 & 12, Feb 22 & 23 and Mar 1 & 2. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Svc 325 will run until 12.50am
